nodes.course_info:
KYRGYZ 105 Intensive Elementary Kyrgyz (15)
Intensive study of grammar with oral and written drill of selected texts.
View course details in MyPlan: KYRGYZ 105

KYRGYZ 101 Elementary Kyrgyz (5)
Emphasizes the four basic language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Kyrgyz. Focuses on exchanging real-life information in the context of the native-speaking environment and understanding Kyrgyz language through the cultural contexts. First in a sequence of three.
View course details in MyPlan: KYRGYZ 101

KYRGYZ 102 Elementary Kyrgyz (5)
Emphasizes the four basic language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Kyrgyz. Focuses on exchanging real-life information in the context of the native-speaking environment and understanding Kyrgyz language through the cultural contexts. Second in a sequence of three.

KYRGYZ 103 Elementary Kyrgyz (5)
Emphasizes the four basic language skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Kyrgyz. Focuses on exchanging real-life information in the context of the native-speaking environment and understanding Kyrgyz language through the cultural contexts. Third in a sequence of three.

KYRGYZ 490 Supervised Study (1-6, max. 18)
Special work in literary texts for graduates and undergraduates.

KYRGYZ 496 Special Studies in Krygyz (3-5, max. 15) VLPA
Topics vary.
View course details in MyPlan: KYRGYZ 496

KYRGYZ 499 Undergraduate Research (3-5, max. 15)
For Turkic language and literature majors.
View course details in MyPlan: KYRGYZ 499

KYRGYZ 203 Intermediate Kyrgyz (5) VLPA
Designed to strengthen and develop further skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing and to deepen an understanding of the cultural context of Kyrgyz. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in elementary Kyrgyz. Third in a sequence of three.

KYRGYZ 202 Intermediate Kyrgyz (5) VLPA
Designed to strengthen and develop further skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing and to deepen an understanding of the cultural context of Kyrgyz. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in elementary Kyrgyz. Second in a sequence of three.

KYRGYZ 201 Intermediate Kyrgyz (5) VLPA
Designed to strengthen and develop further skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing and to deepen an understanding of the cultural context of Kyrgyz. Emphasis on the expansion and refinement of linguistic and communicative skills learned in elementary Kyrgyz. First in a sequence of three.
